name: Unofficial DockerCon 2015 Plugins Demo
tagline: Flocker and Weave as Docker Plugins with Swarm and Compose
body:
### Welcome to the DockerCon 2015 plugins demo landing page.

This website and repo will allow you to play with a Vagrant cluster in the following configuration.

```
$ git clone https://github.com/docker-plugins/demo
$ cd demo
$ make -C vagrantrunner
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
